sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Star from '../Assets/Image/Star.png' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import Add_To_Wishlist_Action from '../Store/Action/Add_To_Wishlist_Action' const ProductCard = ({ data }) => { const [showLoginModal, setShowLoginModal] = useState(false) const dispatch = useDispatch() const token = localStorage.getItem('logintoken') const addtowishlist = () => { if (token) { const id = data._id console.log(id) const reqpayload = { "productId": id } Add_To_Wishlist_Action(dispatch, reqpayload) } else { setShowLoginModal(true) } } return ( <>
{data.Title}
{data.delievery_charge === null ? 'free shipping' : ''}
{data.brandData.name}

{data.Price.sell_price.$numberDecimal} ({data.Price.current_store_price.$numberDecimal})
9% OFF

) } export default ProductCard
